summary: Connie, unwed and pregnant, is heading to Boston by train when she meets wealthy newlyweds Hugh and Patricia. The train crashes, and when Connie comes to in the hospital, she is mistaken for Patricia, who died in the crash with Hugh.
cast: Shirley MacLaine|Ricki Lake|Brendan Fraser|Miguel Sandoval|Loren Dean|Peter Gerety|Jane Krakowski|Debra Monk|Cathryn de Prume|Kate Hennig|Susan Haskell|Justin Van Lieshout|Alec Thomlison|Jennifer Irwin|Victor A.
